mapper.select: select e.exp_name, p.payment_num, u.user_place_name, u.user_phone, e.exp_capacity, e.exp_price, p.order_num, u.user_name, p.payment_method, p.payment_date, u.user_id from user u left join experience e on u.user_num = e.user_num left join order_board o on e.user_num = o.user_num left join payment p on o.order_num = p.order_num where u.user_id = #{user_id}
